Reviews.Title: “Return visit after 2.5 years - just as good as before”

Reviews.Content: returned friends birthday party easter period stayed 4 nights 2 nights hotel service remained excellent despite breakfast available 1300 residents choice bars restaurants excellent evening presence pianist piano bar occasional session impersonators stars concert time occasion elvis marilyn monroe sang hard providing comfortable setting hotel station nearby occasion train replaced bus service bit inconvenient conversations staff enjoy

Reviews.Content: hotel conference food modern beds hard hard cancellation policy crazy 28 days refund extremly expensive change reservation somewhat internet free teh lobby romms wireless wired internet extremely expensive 24 euro day nice recommend hotel sorry

Reviews.Title: “Very good service but far from the city center”
Reviews.Author: jakub-krakau
Reviews.Content: staff friendly efficient facilities modern spacious nice balance classic modern bed hard elegant bathroom buffet breakfast excellent lots variety cold meat eggs bread cookies fruit salads poorest location near centre berlin boring south section city tegel airport taxi costs €60 takes 45 55 minutes fortunately variety restaurants bars hotel compensates little isolated location

Reviews.Title: “I checked out and moved to the centre of Berlin”

Reviews.Content: recently attended conference reason left twofold 1 bed brick beds hotel 2 traveling center town museums eat save money commute hotel near station sbahn lines directly connected airports centre berlin change station issues 2 exits sign hotel platform north exit reaching street passed smoking drinking harassing 2 female conference attendees train walked escorted ladies continued offense remarks sounds ladies particularly shaken hotel railway walk 150m east river left pedestrian crossing game chicken getting busy road hotel entry covered entrance unfortunately aligned step risk death wheels taxi added charm people smoking entrance check routine quiet shower storage ok bed hard hard remade bed house keeping try soften food schizophrenic conference food caterer actually eat dinner night disappointing soup ok grossly cooked edges inedible mentioned server english german smiled shrugged alcohol selection pricing glass spanish red called friend heading jazz club near zoo garten station wrapped rain cold headed station playing spin bottle mit skirted club earlier expected walked looking hotel options business meeting day sore luggage checked course conference people shared feeling trapped little recipe museums nightlife eclectic dining berlin lost attended conference

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for business, good transport links, not so good for tourists.”

Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights business berlin days attending meeting clients spacious restaurant friendly staff hotel 5 minutes walk station short train journey city centre 171 bus connects station schoenefeld airport cheap convenient transfer hotel hotel business youre coming berlin tourist youll centrally located addition situated east berlin neighbourhood surrounding hotel dreary

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights week beds brick soft pillow woke stiff neck bad morning night hotel shower window breakfast ok location train close takes city 12 hour staff friendly aloof stayed berlin prefer park inn comfort location
